| History                 = Task Force was the military response unit for [[Euromind (Earth-616)|Euromind]], a research agency and offshoot of [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]]. Following a collapse by S.H.I.E.L.D., Euromind was overseen by [[Supreme Headquarters Allied Powers Europe (Earth-616)|S.H.A.P.E.]].

Eventually, the team merged with the paranormal/scientific research unit [[EuroLab (Earth-616)|EuroLab]] to form [[Euroforce (Earth-616)|Euroforce]].
